@noveltwin - Even then, nothing is 100% guaranteed. Take the Hellenistic Ptolemaic dynasty of Egypt, for example. They married exclusively amongst themselves, mainly brother-sister and parent-child, for hundreds of years without any documented genetic defects (aside from ‘fat necks’ and ‘large eyes’). Cleopatra, the last Ptolemaic ruler of Egypt who had married (and likely assassinated) both of her brothers, was horrifically inbred but is still remembered today as one of the most beautiful and intelligent women in antiquity.

@whez First generation inbreeding was proven to not have any higher chance of causing birth defects in children from sibling related parents. Its only 2nd and 3rd and so on when the issue starts getting compounded. Also theres this thing called birth control. The "retarded kids" argument is getting really old.

Very wholesome, has a nice story arc and it wraps up cleanly. My only problem is that it ignored lots of hentai manga tropes, most notably the fact that he came inside of her multiple times without her getting pregnant, or without either of them worrying about her getting pregnant. Also, it should definitely be tagged under a lot more things (paizuri, public sex, etc.). 8/10, would fap again

If only the different parts and premises of the story were better developed, this could be one of the gems of the site. The story itself has potential for more than 70 pages, but it opens and closes everything in 25. The premise of the strict father and ahrd children life, the forbidden love, the sentimental conflict, the development of their relationship during the years. Basically, all of the elements of the story, were well organized but poorly developed.

A rather interesting work. The premise was a strong one, but I wish it could explore deeper the idea of developing the relationship in the shadows and the feeling of fear of getting caught, this thing uses the diea of "I exposed the problem, so now the viewer knows it and I can move on" no, it needs deepening and time so the reader can relate to the characters. The evolution of their relationship also feels kinda fake, the childs will tend to explore their bodies together, probably without ending up fucking, but yes playing for some years. The conflict was interesting but the conflict with Reina lasted literally 3 vignettes, and the conflict with the guy lasts 5 vignettes (Needless to say, that's a bad thing xD). Nevertheless, despite the sustained action being pretty lacking, the design of the bodies were prety on point, I'm personally a fan or peal-type bodies, and the action overall was pretty well managed.
Oh yeah..... Nice touch.
